item.title: 562 rc problem
item.dc:creator: @homeboy927 homeboy927
item.description:
@homeboy927 wrote:

im kinda new to coding but heres my problem im trying to add rc to my server but no matter what ur rc level is u can still craft the rune and i dont know how to fix heres my code:

case 2485: if (player.getInventory().contains(7936)) { if (player.getSkills().getLevel(20) >= 53); player.animate(791); player.graphics(186); player.getInventory().deleteItem(7936, 28); player.getInventory().addItem(563, 1); player.getSkills().addXp(20, 3500); player.sm("You gain some rc xp."); return; } if (player.getSkills().getLevel(20) <= 54) { player.sm("You need a runecrafting level of 54."); } else player.sm("You need Pure ess to rc."); break;
